full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
==========================

### Tender Title

- **Tender Title (English)**: W0107-245412 - Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services
- **Tender Title (French)**: W0107-245412 - Services de buanderie et de nettoyage à sec

### Tender Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4399648115 |
| **Tender Reference Number** | WS4399648115-Doc4452546642 |
| **Amendment Number** | 5 |
| **Publication Date** | February 20, 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | March 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | April 1, 2024 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | March 31, 2027 |

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Supported under various international trade agreements, as listed below.
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Service Requirements

The Department of National Defence (DND) Garrison Petawawa requires laundry and dry cleaning services on an “as and when” requested basis. The services are to be provided during the period from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2027 inclusively.

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Carmen Song (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: carmen.song@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

For more information, including tender and compliant specifications, please refer to the attached documentation on the Ariba Discovery
